main event: Two observers reported seeing a bright white light in the sky over Champaign, Illinois, moving in a V formation and then disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately thirty seconds., The first observer spotted the object while lying on a roof and pointed it out to the second observer., The objects were believed to be moving from southeast to northwest., The observers initially thought the light was a star but were convinced it was a UFO., No known aircraft traffic was reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: bright white light in a V formation
witness description: Both observers were lying on the roof of a building when they saw the objects.
